Package com.sr2.flopbox.service

Class FtpService

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Thread
com.sr2.flopbox.service.FtpService
All Implemented Interfaces:
Runnable
public class FtpService
extends Thread
Class which contains all the logic linked to the ftp resource. This service will operate all the commands related to a server ftp. Implements Thread to allow multiple simultaneous connections to ftp servers.
Author:
Adrien Holvoet

  • Method Details

    • run

      public void run()
      The method need to be implemented from Thread class. This is the method launch when the thread is start. This m√©thod will just run the executeCommand method. And save the exception raised if one.
      Specified by:
      run in interface Runnable
      Overrides:
      run in class Thread

    • executeCommand

      public void executeCommand​(String alias, String credentials, Command command, String args0, String args1, String mode) throws IOException, UnexpectedFtpStatusCodeException, NotAuthorizedException
      Execute the commands received by the FtpResource
      Parameters:
      args - Corresponding to the local/remote file/repository
      alias - Server ftp used
      credentials - Corresponding to the user
      command - The command requested
      mode - Mode passive or active
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if any I/O error occurred.
      UnexpectedFtpStatusCodeException
      jakarta.ws.rs.NotFoundException
      NotAuthorizedException

    • putD

      public void putD​(String remoteDirPath, String localParentDir, String remoteParentDir) throws IOException
      Upload a whole directory to a FTP server.
      Parameters:
      remoteDirPath - Path of the destination directory on the server.
      localParentDir - Path of the local directory being uploaded.
      remoteParentDir - Path of the parent directory of the current directory on the server (used by recursive calls).
      Throws:
      IOException - if any network or IO error occurred.

    • logout

      public void logout() throws IOException
      Logs out and disconnects from the server
      Throws:
      IOException - thrown if any I/O error occurred.
